dt: {bc}the act or process of removing the outer coverings (such as bark or husks) from something (such as fiber or seed)
{bc}the surgical removal of the outer layer or covering of an organ or structure (such as the brain or a kidney)

et: Latin {it}decortication-, decorticatio{/it}, from {it}decorticare{/it} to remove the bark from, from {it}de-{/it} + {it}cortic-, cortex{/it} bark {ma}{mat|cuirass|}{/ma}
shortdef: the act or process of removing the outer coverings (such as bark or husks) from something (such as fiber or seed)
the surgical removal of the outer layer or covering of an organ or structure (such as the brain or a kidney)
